plot: Troy, a local pizza boy, is on the verge of losing everything unless he can deliver a pizza in under 30 minutes... on his longboard.
title: Pizza Boy
plot_es: Troy, a local pizza boy, is on the verge of losing everything unless he can deliver a pizza in under 30 minutes... on his longboard.
plot_en: Troy, a local pizza boy, is on the verge of losing everything unless he can deliver a pizza in under 30 minutes... on his longboard.
